ME CONSIDERO UN JUGADOR VERSÁTIL EN LO QUE HA TIPO DE JUEGOS SE REFIERE CON AL MENOS UN NIVEL MEDIO DE COMPLEJIDAD EN GENERAL, HE JUGADO DE TODO A LO LARGO DE MI VIDA DESDE PEQUEÑO Y PUEDO ASEGURAR QUE ESTE TÍTULO ES VERDADERAMENTE ENVICIANTE, COMPARTO CON MI ESPOSA LARGAS HORAS AL DÍA EN NUEVOS DESAFÍOS CADA PARTIDA CON UNA MECÁNICA BASTANTE ORIGINAL, TANTO COMO SUPERVIVIENTE COMO ASESINO, SI ERES LOBO SOLITARIO, JUGAR COMO ASESINO PUEDE SER TU MEJOR OPCIÓN PERO SI TE GUSTA COMPARTIR CON FAMILIA O AMIGOS UN BUEN MOMENTO GAMING, ESTE ES TU JUEGO, LLENO DE VARIEDAD Y UN MUY BUEN DISEÑO DE PERSONAJES, CABE DESTACAR, QUE SI ERES FANÁTICO DE LAS PELÍCULAS Y SERIES DE TERROR, TE VA A ENCANTAR ESTE TÍTULO.
Very good horror/survivor title. A much more in depth game than one might think at first look.  Largely skill based and strategy is key.

こちらのゲームは生存者4人と殺人鬼側1人での 4 VS 1 鬼ごっこゲームとなっております。

生存者側はマップ上に配置された発電機を5台修理し、ゲートを開けて脱出する。
殺人鬼側は発電機の修理を邪魔し、可能な限り生存者をフックに吊るし殺害する事が目的です。（3回吊って殺害）

生存者側は問題はなく好きなように楽しむ事が出来ます。
その一方殺人鬼側は非常に辛いゲームとなっております。

基本的には殺人鬼側の移動速度は生存者よりも速く追いかけているうちに追いつき攻撃する事ができますが、上手いプレイヤーの場合追いつく事は容易ではありません。
生存者は二回攻撃を与える事により地面に倒れ殺人鬼が担ぎ吊るす事が出来ますが、”必死に追いかける→なんとか一撃与える→逃げる→また時間をかけて追いかける”と一人相手に時間を掛け過ぎると他のプレイヤーに発電機をドンドン修理されてしまいます。

”プレイヤースキルを上げれば”と思うかもしれませんが相手プレイヤーがボイスチャットを使っている場合情報を共有でき、殺人鬼側は一人なので圧倒的に不利になります。
例1：生存者をダウンさせフックに吊るす時、前もってボイスチャットでフックの排除を指示できる（フックが無いので生存者はもがいて再び逃げる事ができる）
例2：自分が今殺人鬼に追われているので安心して修理を優先するように指示
例3：追いつかれるから他の誰かに肉壁を指示（殺人鬼の進行路に立って道を塞ぎ逃げる時間を稼ぐ）

殺人鬼のキャラクターはたくさんいますがキャラクターによって”強い・弱い”がありますのでプレイヤーは強いキャラクターばかり使うようになり、マンネリ化しております。
下手な殺人鬼だと生存者は余裕を持って煽りに来るのでストレスも溜まります。

こういった事が以前からずっと続いていますので殺人鬼側をプレイするユーザーが少なくなり、生存者側でプレイする時はゲームマッチングにかなり時間が掛かるようになってしまいました。

[b] 今天写这个评测，主要是为新入坑的玩家提个醒 [/b]
游戏是个好游戏，然而一个人玩是恐怖游戏，好友联机就成了沙雕游戏 
如果你觉得有哪些屠夫或人类好玩想买，推荐各位等到打折时直接入DLC，[u] 绝大多数DLC都是包含一屠夫一人类一其他一些小道具以及地图 [/u]，这样的性价比最好，DLC里的地图就是指玩家能玩到的地图场景，当然你不买也是可以玩到的，只要你匹配到有DLC的玩家，随机抽取地图是有概率抽到的；而如果你是单边玩家，只玩人类或屠夫，也可以游戏里充值暗金细胞（无上限）只买角色，但这样算下来不如买DLC划算，而且没有小礼品和地图，同时游戏里的皮肤也都可以用暗金细胞购买；然后是荧光裂片（无上限）是玩家肝游戏升级给的一种货币，可以买部分角色、部分皮肤和传承技能（在不买角色的情况下直接获得该角色的30/35/40级传承技能），这里不推荐各位用这个买角色，直接买皮肤或者传承技能就好了[spoiler] 泪水从我的眼角滑过 [/spoiler]；最后就是升级角色所需要的血点（上限100万）了，是通过玩家游戏内表现/完成每日任务给予的货币
黎明杀机虽然最低配置要求8g内存，不过我4g的笔记本也能带的动[strike] 就是偶尔会卡顿 [/strike]，各位低配玩家也可以试试
还行除了bug让原地鬼畜 拉你去当壮丁10段排到四个人皇 气场看都看不见之外 其他到还好
游戏非常耐玩= =就是角色皮肤可以做好看一点吗，感觉角色皮肤丑的人都没有多少购买欲望，很难消费的游戏

Dead by Daylight is a asymmetrical action horror game in which a player plays as a bloodthirsty killer tasked with hunting down and sacrificing four other players all playing as survivors attempting to escape. Oh and the game is pretty goofy.
The game has some issues such as certain perks in the game being significantly better than others to the point that some perks in the meta cant be ignored in most builds while other perks are nearly useless outside of meme builds, the game also suffers from a toxic fanbase (everyone has been the toxic one at one point no matter what they say) which causes many post game chats to have at least one salty individual who is mad at another player, typically the survivors will blame the killer for certain things such as tactics like slugging which involves downing a survivor and leaving them on the ground effectively forcing other survivors to pick them up or be down a teammate while the killer doesn't need to even walk to a hook. or sometimes survivors will have a problem with certain killer and perk combinations or just particular perks, for example see the infamous Noed (No one escapes death), a perk which makes it so that once all generators are powered the killer moves faster and downs all survivors in one hit. However it goes both ways and many killers have their own toxic tendencies such as hooking a survivor and hitting them while they're still on the hook or staying very close to the hook in an attempt to catch survivors and possibly get another down without having to search for it. Although it can seem like allot of the community is toxic there are also many nice players who will give ggs and tell you what you did well in the post game chat, and when you experience that its a very nice experience since both sides understand that the other side has its own set of struggles. Furthermore my final point on balance issues is two of the most infamous items in the game which are the memento moris for the killer side and the keys for the survivor side, at the time of writing this there are three types of memento mori, the cypress memento mori which allows you to kill the last survivor alive by your own hand as long as theyve been hooked once, the ivory memento mori which allows you to kill one survivor of your choice at any time in the match as long as they've been hooked once, and finally the worst one the ebony memento mori which allows you to kill all the survivors by your own hand as long as they've been hooked once. The memento mori is an INCREDIBLY unbalanced item as it forces the survivors to shift their play style to playing entirely around avoiding being found at all after being hooked once by any means necessary or they will instantly be killed. However the key is in my opinion just as bad, there are many verisons of the key much like the memento mori typically the keys are referred to by the color of their rarity (green, purple, and red/pink) the green key is often used as a red herring in order to make the killer believe they are up against a higher rarity key essentially acting as a scare tactic, the purple key is the first key that is truly dangerous as it is the first key that is able to open the hatch which allows survivors to escape without needing to power generators or open exit gates this key has 5 seconds of use (extendable by add ons) when the survivor opens the hatch any survivor can use it to escape so survivors will bring keys typically when playing with friends and if they begin to lose the match the player with the key opens the hatch and lets their friends jump in repeatedly opening the hatch until everyone gets to leave, finally the red/pink key has all the powers of the purple key with 30 seconds of use allowing in some cases full survivor teams to escape using a single key with add ons extending use time. Much like with the memento moris forcing survivors to completely change their play style to counter them killers must change the way they play if they want to ensure the key is not used and the match is not lost to survivors doing the hatch key escape, typically by bringing the perk franklins demise to force survivors to drop their item and the entity to consume them after an amount of time paired with the slugging tactic to slow generator progress and by extension extend the amount of time before the hatch spawns.

All in all Dead by Daylight is a good game with an incredible amount of potential that suffers from balance issues as many games of a similar nature do. I do however believe it is one of the MORE BALANCED asymmetrical games I have played and I have sunk many hours into this game and do not regret a single minute of my time in the game because even when I'm getting upset and struggling with keys or other things I'm still having fun at the end of the day playing as a wide array of my favorite characters from horror movies along with many original characters from Behavior that are interesting and well designed aesthetically.

For my final rating of the game I would say Dead by Daylight is a 7.5/10 with the potential to hit a 9 or even 10 if the balance issues (keys and moris especially) were addressed. Try it out and see if you enjoy it, chances are you will if you can handle a few people being toxic.

Dead by Daylight, eskilerin slasher filmlerinden esinlenerek oluşturulduğu kesin olmakla birlikte, oyuna dışarıdan bakınca gerçekten tuhaf bir oyun olduğunu hemen fark ediyorsunuz ve diğer oyunlardan çok farklı bir yapıda olduğunu da öyle. Fakat oyuna girince ve alışınca gerçekten iyi bir online oyun olduğunu fark edebiliyorsunuz. Ah birde şu farmcılar olmasa daha iyi olacak ama o kadarda olacak artık.

Oyunu survivor olarak oynamak için gereken tek püf nokta: O sizden hızlı arkadaşlar, en yavaşı bile sizden kat kat hızlı dolayısıyla düşman arkadayken, acele etmemek ve en önemlisi panik yapmamak, sürekli hareketlerini inceleyerek yanıltmak. Buna alışmak için de en az 20-30 saat vermelisiniz.
Would highly recommend this game. High skill cap on both sides (as survivor and the killer).

Llevo muchas horas, y hasta ahora no le encuentro lo aburrido :DD

Edit: Tras haber jugado más de mil horas, me di cuenta que siempre hay algo que uno hace mal :'v Si sabes loopear y no te tumban por 3 gens, te campean/tunelean, si no sabes loopear, tu equipo no hace nada y nunca hay más de un gen reparado :'v Si quieres hacerte famoso transmitiendo esto, ya hay mucha competencia >:c en fin, sigue siendo divertido a pesar de todo eso :v agreguenme para jugar a ver si aprendo más :v

Even thought this game has been out several years, my brother and a couple of friends all bought it to play while quarantined.  I am not a big purchaser of DLC, but I just bought all of it for this game since I'm having so much fun with it.
Playing as the Survivor, there is SO MUCH STRESS.  It's crazy how much adrenaline can get going when you are attempting to fix a gennie, the dial is going to come up with very little warning and your heart starts beating faster and faster.
Completely different experience playing as the Killer.  Watch everyone scatter before you in terror while you giggle maniacally.
The community is pretty toxic, unfortunately. The only way I would recommend playing is with chat hidden - especially if you decide to play as a Killer.
As a big fan of horror movies, this is perfect.  If you love horror movies and don't mind playing a multiplayer game, I highly recommend it.

Haritaların birbirine benzerliği can sıkıcı çok fazla saati olan hayatta kalanlar atlama yerleri ve paletlerin yerini ezberliyorlar. Bazı hayatta kalanların her koştuğu yer palet adam ezberlemiş.Daha farklı haritaların gelmesi şart mevcut haritalarda zaman zaman değişiklik yapılmalı ezber yapılmayacak şekilde ayrıca haritalar o korku havasını hiç yaşatmıyor.Katillerin özellikleri çok az uzun zaman oynayınca sıkıyor.Birine kafayı takıp sürekli başında bekleyen katillere çözüm getirilmeli genel olarak bu katillerin rankları yüksek oluyor rank sistemi yanlış çalışıyor.Arkadaşlarınla oynarsan keyif alabilirsin.Diğer oyuncularla oynarsanız hayal kırıklığı yaşayabilirsiniz.Bazen gerçekten çok sinir olabiliyorsunuz.
